summary: At the height of the Peruvian gold rush, an Andean woman able to communicate with water spirits uses her powers to prevent a mining corporation from destroying the lake she considers to be her mother.
cast: Nélida Ayay Chilón|Maxima Acuna Atalaya Chaupe|Andrea Martínez Martínez|Bibi van der Velden|Marco Arana
title: Hija de la laguna
